import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import MovieList from "../../api/MovieList"; import { UserContext } from "../../context/UserContext"; export default function UserReg() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [passwd, setPasswd] = useState(); const {user,setUsers}=useContext(UserContext); const handleChanges = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const data = await MovieList.get(`/login/:${email}`); setUsers(data.data); console.log(data.data); } catch (error) { console.log(error.message); } }; return (

Sign in to your account

{setPasswd(e.target.value)}} autoComplete="current-password" required className="appearance-none rounded-none relative block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 placeholder-gray-500 text-gray-900 rounded-b-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:z-10 sm:text-sm" placeholder="Password" />
